00024 
00025 #ifndef PIPELINE_BUILDER_H_
00026 #define PIPELINE_BUILDER_H_
00027 
00028 #include "TopicLearner/Model_Refiner.h"
00029 
00030 //!An interface that all pipeline objects must implement
00031 /**
00032  * A pipeline is a sequence of computation steps
00033  * that can be performed on some data passing through
00034  * it. Its similar to an assembly pipeline.
00035  */
00036 class Pipeline {
00037 public:
00038     virtual void init() = 0;
00039     virtual void add_reader() = 0;
00040     virtual void add_sampler() = 0;
00041     virtual void add_updater() = 0;
00042     virtual void add_optimizer() = 0;
00043     virtual void add_eval() = 0;
00044     virtual void add_writer() = 0;
00045     virtual void add_tester() = 0;
00046     virtual void clear() = 0;
00047     virtual void destroy() = 0;
00048     virtual void run() = 0;
00049     virtual Model_Refiner& get_refiner() = 0;
00050     virtual double get_eval() = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif /* PIPELINE_BUILDER_H_ */
